DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the initial safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of MK-8655, after single and multiple daily oral administrations to participants with Type 2 Diabetes (T2DM). The study will assess the reduction in fasting plasma glucose concentrations from baseline after multiple daily administrations of MK-8655.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of MK-8655 in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-8655-002 AM1)
